summary: This is an email from an NYPD email address to an FBI email address, forwarding notes filled out by Detective Harkins for a hotline following Jeffrey Epstein's arrest. The email includes several attachments.

persons.name: Detective Harkins
persons.context: The detective who filled out notes for a hotline after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest, as mentioned in the forwarding email.

events.title: Epstein's Arrest
events.description: The arrest of Jeffrey Epstein, which prompted the creation of hotline notes by Detective Harkins.

keyFacts: An NYPD detective named Harkins filled out notes for a hotline following Jeffrey Epstein's arrest.
The notes were forwarded via email from an NYPD address to an FBI address on September 10, 2021.
The email included four attachments, likely containing the hotline notes or related documents.
